com.andoverrobotics.core.utilities

Class MotorAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andoverrobotics.core.utilities.CachedMotor
      • com.andoverrobotics.core.utilities.MotorAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMotor

    public class MotorAdapter
extends CachedMotor
implements IMotor
    Adapts a DcMotor to the IMotor interface for the DriveTrains.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MotorAdapter(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor motor)
      Creates a new MotorAdapter for the given motor.
